attributes.action: Push the US administration to make a decision over Afghanistan strategy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The deaths of British service personnel in Afghanistan which continue while the US administration dithers over its strategy for that 'country' is unnacceptable.  

As Prime Minister of the UK it is incumbent upon Gordon Brown to ensure that British lives are not wasted.  We call on the PM to advise the US Administration that British troops will be pulled out of Afghanistan within 1 month unless they make a commitment to meet agreed objectives and outline a strategy for meeting those objectives. The time for Obama rhetoric is over, its time for him to act like a leader instead of talking about being a leader.
